医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
减肥手术可以预防肥胖女性患乳腺癌研究人员调查了女性减肥手术与乳腺癌发病率之间的关联，并确定基线胰岛素水平是否会影响减肥手术对乳腺癌风险的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Bariatric-surgery-may-protect-against-development-of-breast-cancer-in-women-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Bariatric-surgery-may-protect-against-development-of-breast-cancer-in-women-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2200c1a-6edd-49db-8796-24c879d88fe3 Mon, 20 May 2024 07:07:00 -0400 Bariatric surgery may protect against development of breast cancer in women with obesity
射频消融的最佳实践为房颤患者带来了良好的治疗效果心房颤动 (AF) 是全世界最常见的心律失常或心律不齐形式，仅在美国就影响了数百万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Best-practices-in-RF-ablation-yield-excellente28099-outcomes-for-atrial-fibrillation-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Best-practices-in-RF-ablation-yield-excellente28099-outcomes-for-atrial-fibrillation-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7d4e1cc-9e74-4e1e-b07b-90dfd5f418f0 Mon, 20 May 2024 06:56:00 -0400 Best practices in RF ablation yield excellent outcomes for atrial fibrillation patients
医疗补助取消协议打击了美洲原住民脆弱的护理系统在 covid-19 公共卫生紧急事件发生后，重新确定医疗补助资格的过程大约一年后，已有超过 2000 万人被取消了针对低收入家庭的联邦-州联合计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Medicaid-unwinding-deals-blow-to-tenulous-system-of-care-for-Native-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Medicaid-unwinding-deals-blow-to-tenulous-system-of-care-for-Native-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4793aea-6da3-440f-9797-d6b16e4d6b0c Mon, 20 May 2024 06:41:03 -0400 Medicaid unwinding deals blow to tenuous system of care for Native Americans
利用胰高血糖素样肽 1 定向 N-甲基-D-天冬氨酸受体抑制治疗肥胖双峰药物成功治愈小鼠模型中的肥胖、高血糖和血脂异常。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Treating-obesity-using-glucagon-like-peptide-1-directed-N-methyl-D-aspartate-receptor-inhibition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Treating-obesity-using-glucagon-like-peptide-1-directed-N-methyl-D-aspartate-receptor-inhibition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcaf00ff-c91d-4a58-9fe1-385e06cf7d9c Mon, 20 May 2024 05:44:00 -0400 Treating obesity using glucagon-like peptide-1-directed N-methyl-D-aspartate receptor inhibition
非病毒基因疗法为慢性腰痛患者带来希望一种治疗椎间盘源性背痛（DBP）的新型非病毒基因疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Non-viral-gene-therapy-offers-hope-for-chronic-low-back-pain-sufferers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Non-viral-gene-therapy-offers-hope-for-chronic-low-back-pain-sufferers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7223493-5204-4b49-a3b2-46e9b60cce38 Mon, 20 May 2024 04:48:00 -0400 Non-viral gene therapy offers hope for chronic low back pain sufferers
研究表明地中海饮食可以减轻压力和焦虑症状地中海饮食有益于健康，这已不是什么秘密。南澳大利亚大学的新研究表明，地中海饮食可以降低患肠癌、心脏病和痴呆症的风险，还可以减轻压力和焦虑症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Mediterranean-diet-can-reduce-symptoms-of-stress-and-anxiety-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Mediterranean-diet-can-reduce-symptoms-of-stress-and-anxiety-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f8b3824-4cf1-47ac-a74b-6876a4c4f12c Mon, 20 May 2024 04:20:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet can reduce symptoms of stress and anxiety, study shows
美敦力 (Medtronic) 的 Evolut 瓣膜可减少严重主动脉瓣狭窄女性的功能障碍，提高其生活质量全球医疗保健技术领导者美敦力 (Medtronic) 今天公布了最大的经股经导管主动脉瓣置换术 (TAVR) 头对头比较试验 SMall Annuli 随机进化或 SAPIEN (SMART) 试验的新数据，该试验专门针对女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Medtronice28099s-Evolut-valve-reduces-dysfunction-improves-quality-of-life-in-women-with-severe-aortic-stenos.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Medtronice28099s-Evolut-valve-reduces-dysfunction-improves-quality-of-life-in-women-with-severe-aortic-stenos.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6a1c4c0-8860-41ae-93d3-37743edd1bb2 Mon, 20 May 2024 04:18:00 -0400 Medtronic’s Evolut valve reduces dysfunction, improves quality of life in women with severe aortic stenos
牙医解释阿尔茨海默氏症和口腔健康之间的联系本周是痴呆症行动周，这是一项在英国各地举行的活动，旨在让公众采取行动，帮助改善痴呆症患者的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Dentist-explains-the-connection- Between-Alzheimers-and-oral-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Dentist-explains-the-connection- Between-Alzheimers-and-oral-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=385a7b2a-2b54-4939-9b67-8789e837f651 Mon, 20 May 2024 04:11:00 -0400 Dentist explains the connection between Alzheimer's and oral health
新型登革热疫苗TAK-003获得世界卫生组织高负担地区资格预审一种新的登革热疫苗于 2024 年 5 月 10 日获得世界卫生组织 (WHO) 的资格预审。TAK-003 是第二种获得世界卫生组织资格预审的登革热疫苗。它由武田开发，是一种减毒活疫苗，含有引起登革热的四种病毒血清型的弱化版本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-dengue-vaccine-TAK-003-gains-WHO-prequalification-for-high-burden-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-dengue-vaccine-TAK-003-gains-WHO-prequalification-for-high-burden-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e90900d-6953-4304-a508-34f5fca49d06 Mon, 20 May 2024 04:07:00 -0400 New dengue vaccine TAK-003 gains WHO prequalification for high-burden areas
NHS 敦促扩大所有二尖瓣反流患者的 TEER 获取范围针对常见心脏病的一种名为“经导管边缘对边缘修复”（TEER）的挽救生命的医疗手术对于许多可以帮助的患者来说并不适用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/NHS-urged-to-expand-TEER-access-for-all-mitral-regurgitation-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/NHS-urged-to-expand-TEER-access-for-all-mitral-regurgitation-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=674ab227-d4c4-49af-9100-6ce04191f845 Mon, 20 May 2024 03:58:00 -0400 NHS urged to expand TEER access for all mitral regurgitation patients
